title: Publishing your first HTML page with Generative AI for Non-Coders

description.summary: This video introduces non-coders to generative AI by demonstrating how to generate and run their first HTML page using a large language model.
steps: 1. Open ChatGPT or your preferred AI model.
2. Ask the model to generate a basic HTML page.
4. Open a text editor (e.g., Notepad, Sublime Text).
5. Paste the HTML code into the editor.
7. Open the file in a web browser to view the page.
8. (Optional) Embed the HTML code into a Google Site.
9. Publish and view the site online.
